body.name: Gaiatop Mini Portable Fan, Sparkle Handheld Fan, Hand Held Fan 3 Speed Personal, 3-10 Hours Operated Small Makeup Eyelash Fan for Women Girls Kids Indoor Outdoor Travelling Navy Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 17 mins
features: ☀ Sparkling firefly design: The tail of the mini portable fan has a luminous design, which makes the fan have a lively life. The mini fan can be as beautiful as a firefly at night, and it can also shiny in the dark, which makes it more convenient for us to take and store. Just enjoy the atmosphere when using it outdoors!

☀ Ultimate compact design: Our mini handheld fan retains strong wind power and durable life while optimizing the space design to make it more compact and portable, even in our pockets. The compact fan has a rounded touch, it's more suitable and comfortable for us to hold in hands. Combined with latest ABS material,the fan is environmentally friendly and comfortable.

☀ Super strong wind: The new air channel design and brushless motor make the small fan has very strong wind. There are three gears in total: the soft first gear can be like a gentle breeze, the moderate second gear can be like a sea blowing, and the strong third gear can instantly cool you down!

☀ Long-lasting battery life: small personal fan but has large battery capacity, it is suitable for us to take to the beach, amusement park, outdoor travel and other places. The 2000mA high-capacity battery life is more durable and allows us to enjoy a long-time cool. The first gear can last for 10 hours, a full charge only takes 2 hours.

☀ Surprise gift: Beautiful packaging, exquisite fan and surprising lighting design make handheld fan the favorite gift for every child and pretty girl! We will also provide professional after-sales service to ensure your rights and interests, to give you the best shopping experience with the best quality travel fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best portable fan ever! I got it for helping my makeup set faster and keeping me from sweating on hot days while trying to do my makeup. This thing has some serious power! I've brought it along on hit days when we go out with the kids and it's been a life saver for cooling them off when they start to get too hot. I ended up showing it to my mom (going through menopause so hot flashes all the time) and I ordered her one and she loves it! So worth it! Holds the charge for a long time too!

reviews.reviewerName: Great fit, love the material and the colour was so pretty
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This fan surprised me. The speed and the ability to change to different levels was a win for me. Worth the buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is a life saver for hot flashes! Has 3 different speeds and stays charged for awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 4 of these little fans in pink, dark blue, green and white. I gave this 5 stars because of the customer service! They reached out to me to see how my purchase went and if it a smooth process. I had a hiccup with the white fan, but customer service fixed that issue with no problems. With that being said It blows a decent amount of air, just enough to help in this massive amount of heat AL is having. The light is bright enough to find keys in your purse or what ever else you are looking for. The white fan light was too dim 😭, but customer service for the company is currently helping me with that issue. I can't really speak on the battery life because i only use it a couple of hours at a time. It does take quite sometime to charge. If you want something light and compact this is the fan for you! I carry the pink one in my purse at all times. It doesn't take up space and it is very light weight, which is another reason I chose this mini handheld fan. I really liked the white one, but once my replacement gets here I will be very happy and I will carry the white one in my purse! It will go EVERYWHERE with me lol. Overall my purchase experience and interaction with the company customer service was above and beyond, 5 stars!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok if you're hot and need a little more air.
reviews.reviewText: It works ok but definitely not as strong air flow in the advertising picture. Its load too, like a blow dryer on low. Still cute and good if you're walking around in the heat.

reviews.reviewText: omg I love it! has 3 different types of speed. I use it during my makeup routine to dry up & it’s incredible. it was also be a hit during summer times and it come with a lanyard so it’s super convenient. I take it everywhere with me!
